mapper.select: SELECT u.id as "id" , u.first_name as "firstName" , u.last_name as "lastName" , u.date_of_birth as "dateBirth" , u.email as "email" , u.password as "password" , u.contact as "contact" , u.gender as "gender" , u.create_by as "createBy" , u.create_date as "createDate" , u.modify_by as "modifyBy" , u.modify_date as "modifyDate" , u.status as "status" , u.description as "description" , u.address_id as "addressID" , u.resource_id as "resourceID" FROM "user" u WHERE u.status != #{status}

SELECT id as "id" , first_name as "firstName" , last_name as "lastName" , date_of_birth as "dateBirth" , email as "email" , password as "password" , contact as "contact" , gender as "gender" , create_by as "createBy" , create_date as "createDate" , modify_by as "modifyBy" , modify_date as "modifyDate" , status as "status" , description as "description" , address_id as "addressID" , resource_id as "resourceID" FROM user WHERE id = #{id}
